name: Heroes of War
description:
Hello Everyone!
First of all, Thanks for viewing my game.I hope you'll like it.
Controls:
Screen Movement: Move the mouse left or right.
Unit Selection: Click on a unit to select it.
Base Upgrade: Click on "Base Upgrade Button" to upgrade it.
Gold Mine Upgrade: Click on "Gold Mine Upgrade" to upgrade it.

Game Play:
This is a simple Strategy, Base Defence Game.
Your Goal is to Destroy the Enemy Base before your own base gets destroyed.
You will have to think strategically and try your best to win.
The game gets harder as you progress.
Currently there is no difficulty system.

Note:
The game is still a work in progress.
This game was made in one week as a challenge.
Bugs are expected.

Thanks again! and Goodluck!
